{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WGT624 |revision=v2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/17/2004 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY3WGR614V3 |ic_id=4054A-WGR614V3 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2313A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2313A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:09:5B,00:0F:B5 |oui_eth=00:09:5B,00:0F:B5 }} ''108 Mbps Wireless Firewall Router''
[http://support.netgear.com/app/products/model/a_id/2594 Product page] Manuf. by Foxconn / Hon Hai / Ambit, model U12H023 / U12H018 (silkscreened on the board) Per a C2PC made 03/17/2004, this device uses AR2313. Appears to use the same main board as the WGR614v3 (see below DD-WRT forum link). RAM and Flash appear to differ between units (some may be [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=12672 2/8] while others may be [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=33975 4/16]). [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=33975 On the DD-WRT forums]
[http://www.embraceit.com.au/wgt624/ Resurrecting the WGT624v1/v2 without JTAG] [[File:Wgt624v2-front.jpeg|200px|thumb|left]] [[File:Wgt624v2-back.jpeg|200px|thumb|left]] == Firmware == Same as [[Netgear_WGT624v1]]
